title: What is the most broken ability in the game?
body:
There are several abilities that get on everyones nerves. 

Id enjoy some feedback on what you find to be the most obnoxious ability in the game?

for me personally its Darius' pull, sh*ts been having bugs since darius' release.
Pantheons stun coming in a close 2nd

replies.body: veigar stun, instant aoe stun

Ryan's passive 
Fizz E
Who da f**k is ryan?
Time bomb.
{{champion:75}} Q and slow
Anivia's passive. No longer changes her name to Eggnivia. **Broken**.
Morde's ult. I really love the whole thing of raising the dead but there are so many stat boosts that Irelia gets jealous. He'll forever be a "Frozen Mallet" until his ult get a serious tune up.

Poppy's Ult.

Black Shield.

Shadow Dance.

Azir W 
Huehuehue

Yorick's ult, it just messes with the death count so much some times.

Infinite death bug for example
Skarner's Q

Four jump straight into my mind.

-Kalista passive
-Fiddlesticks E
-Tryndamere R
-Nasus Q

The last two are champions I wouldn't feel a twitch of regret deleting from the game if I had the chance.

Lee Sin kick

Literally-uncounterable except for an enemy azir wall

Click-and-point, near instantaneous speed.

Poppy's ult without a doubt.

Next would be tryndamere's ult.

And then we have Kalista's passive, which is only broken because the entire champion is broken. "I'm a utility adc who does more damage than most other lategame hyper carries, while also being one of the most mobile champions in the game. W00t"

There is a difference between OP, Annoying, game breaking (broken), and toxic.

Darius's E is toxic, and is one of the reason's he cant be buffed. I don't really know why riot won't just fix the e bug so Darius can actually be buffed or something but... whatever. I guess being able to pull people who have flashed/dashed/doneboth right back to you is part of his champion identity.
Karthus ulti is pretty annoying. But I'd say Nasus Q or Akali ulti.

Kalista passive.
Poppy passive.
Anyone with resets.  
Nidalee.  Just... all of her.
If we're talking about 1 single ability being the most obnoxious in general, I would say it's Lee's ulti with everything considered.

Annie's Passive.

Annie's Q

Annie's W

Annie's E

Tibbers.

Yeah, i hate Annie.

My top few, in no particular order:

Kalista passive
TF Pick a card
Shaco's invis
Yasuo windwall
Lee sin's Q, W, E, and R
